content: Says Tap Anywhere to begin but isn't responding. No Error messages are appearing. Just freezing and the music still plays. EDIT: Uninstalled and reinstalled. Still happening!
replyContent:
Update: Could you try uninstalling and reinstalling to see if that fixes it?

Sorry to hear this! Are you getting an error message or anything?

content: Really nice game. Complex and creepy. Not a fan of the interrupting flashing, and i did need to use the hints a few times, but at least they were built in. Worth the time and money.
Played for the thirtieth time, I think. :) I love going back to the story even though I've played it before. And I can't say that about many games at all.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Excellent game, enjoyed this and the next parts very much! Thank you, hopefully you are making more of these. A lot of quality time for a little money, appreciated!
replyContent: Really glad to hear it! We have other adventure games on the store and we're working on a new one called Another Tomorrow.

content: All Glitch games are awesome and worth the money.
It's difficult to use and some buttons barely work. There an X button to leave one menu that I have to click to the left of in order to get it to respond. No tutorial.
replyContent: Feel free to get in contact with us so we can try to sort this out.

content: Good graphics. Not so intuitive interaction. When I closed the game and re opened it, I started back at the beginning. I went to get the camera and after solving the puzzle, the camera was not there or in my inventory. Not a good start. Got a refund.
Fantastic
Great game. Great series. Played it years ago. Just downloaded it again.
I have been wanting a game like this for so long, it was so wonderful and tricky and very well done. I can't wait to play the next one!
replyContent: Glad you liked it! Hope you like episode 2!

content: Glitch games is right, escape library go up in lift go left in corridor, then black screen with sfx in background. Had to watch YouTube video to see end😢 After reading reviews after this problem discovered many had same issue going back to 2013! So devs aren't arsed about fixing it then👎
replyContent:
Sorry about this! It's a hard bug to reproduce and we haven't yet managed to do it ourselves and without being able to rerpoduce bugs are very hard to fix. 

We are just 2 people and with 9 games on multiple store it's very hard to support all of them as much as we'd like.

content: Love this loooong time ! All the series its boss!
I enjoyed this game. It was a bit too easy, I would have liked some puzzles to be more challenging, to get a mix. It was also a bit short for the money, but a good game.
replyContent: Thanks for playing! The next two episodes in the trilogy are bigger and harder.

content: This was soooo good. Good challenge not to easy not to simple. Good graphics and a good vibe. I do find it a bit pricey because I have to buy all the episodes. But good job one of the few apps I really enjoy.
The game is grand but not worth the price. Most other escape games other similar without the price tag. Not good value IMO.
replyContent: Sorry to hear you feel that way. If you have any specific feedback please do email us.

content: Loved this game! The dev said this leads on from cabin escape which i quite enjoyed so gave it a go and it's loads better! Challenging, eerie, attention to detail. Would definitely recommend. Gonna download second one now!
replyContent:
So so happy to hear that you liked the game after playing Cabin! Please let us know what you think of ep2 when you have played it! 

Also, please consider joinging our Discord as well where we all just sit and discuss how awesome we are with our players ( well that's a lie, we discuss loads of non Glitch games too ) http://glitch.games/discord

content: Got extremely boring, extremely quickly! Total waste of money
replyContent: Sorry you feel that way.

content: Fun game!

I'll tell you what is 'forever lost' - my save game! Somehow the game restarted from the beginning but all the item states were not reset. So I have my full inventory but can't get out of the first room since none of the items are there anymore. Quite a good game, but not sure I'll play it through again to finish now.
i paid 399 and it doesnt even open, refund me my money trying to reach out to is useless
replyContent: I am sorry to hear this! We are not ignoring you though, your email came in the same day this review was posted and we are only 2 people and reply to emails in the order they come in. I will now sort your refund.

content: Could not put it down.

A pleasantly gloomy escape-style game with mostly reasonable puzzles. (There's a long list of hints in-game, but I rarely needed them.) It's nice to play an adventure game that doesn't bombard you with story details. It keeps it pretty simple, just a page of reading material here and there, and what do you know - I actually want to know what happens next. Less is more.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and very glad to hear you liked the game so much! Hopefully you enjoy the rest of the trilogy as well!

content: Glitch adventure games have always been excellent for me. Very challenging and not too easy, an immersive experience, great mood music, and excellent story lines. Please keep making new adventures for us to enjoy!
replyContent:
We'll keep making them as long as people keep buying them! :-)

Our next game is going to be Veritas - www.veritasthegame.com

content: Fun puzzle game with decent graphics and an interesting mix of puzzle types. I found the puzzles difficult enough to keep me interested, but didnt need hints to solve it. My only complaint would be that it was over too quickly, would have loved more rooms especially for a paid game. Luckily there is episode 2 to move on to!
paid but it won't dl beyond 245?
replyContent: Sorry to hear this. Please ensure you have a strong wifi connection during the download.

content: Eminently worth the price. Finished it in less than a day, having checked hints a handful of times in the latter half, and am immediately moving on to the second. Only three issues stuck out to me: the black-screen no-UI bug after the scene with the "door closing" sign (which I had to reset the game in order to get past), trouble getting the hints to open and close instead of scrolling, and the third note for the xylophone doesn't sound like what it is.

This game is irritatingly hard. There are no natural conclusions to seemingly simple problems. You will not get through this game without looking up the walkthrough because there are no hints. I'm thoroughly disappointed and I want a refund.
replyContent:
I'm sorry you found it so hard, we strive to find a nice balance of difficulty for the puzzles but it's tricky to get it perfect. 

However you, and anyone reading this, should know that there are hints included in the game. Just tap "Hints" from the main menu.

content: I dont like it. I want a refund.
replyContent: Thanks for the constructive feedback. Please get in touch so we can either sort out whatever issue you have or issue a refund.

content: Awesome
This is honestly one of, if not my favourite mobile games and always will be.
EDIT: Thanks Glitch team for assisting me with the problem im encountering.  Completed game and moving on to EP 2
replyContent:
Sorry, I somehow missed your email but have now replied. We are just two people here so sometimes things happen.

There is a fix for this bug ( the clock puzzle ) listed on our support page here - https://glitch.games/support/faqs/

content: Paid...downloaded....game doesnt work!!! Refund please
replyContent:
Hi Damien,

Is there an error message? Please contact us via email to see if we can get this sorted.

Thanks!

content:
I absolutely love Glitch Games!! I have been waiting patiently for the next 
game and came back to play the FL series again. Episode 1 is a little 
shorter than the rest, but it is just as good. The storyline is fantastic, 
the puzzles are well thought out and make sense. I do some research before 
paying for games, and I don't do it often. However, I have now paid twice 
for the series because I love this game so much. -Your biggest fan P.S. 
Please hurry with your next game!!

Very enjoyable, over too quickly but fortunately there are more. Absolutely 
worth the price! Spelling mistakes annoyed me.
replyContent: Glad you liked it and hope you enjoy the rest of the trilogy! Please send any spelling mistakes to hey@glitchgames.co.uk so we can get them corrected in a later update, thanks!

content:
After playing "The Room" series maybe my hopes were too high and this game 
seemed really short for the price. Controls & gameplay reminded me of the 
Myst point & click style, which I like but they were unresponsive 
sometimes. Storyline is pretty intriguing and honestly the only reason I'd 
consider continuing to buy the series...

I have played and enjoyed every single game you guys put out! Now patiently 
waiting for All That Remains part . In the meantime, I am playing FL 
trilogy again! Yes...again.

Paid for this app, downloaded it. Now every time I try to open it to play 
it for the 1st time I just get a black screen and nothing happens. This app 
doesn't work. What a rip off for 5$
replyContent:
Sorry about this! There are issues with Samsung devices that we are looking into right now. 

Please remember though that if you have an issue with an app ( not just ours ) the best thing to do is to contact the developer so that they can get the issue solved. If you contact devs you can provide more info about the issue so it can be tracked down.

content:
This game is amazing. The only escape game that will actually make me 
think. I normally dont buy games but I couldn't resist buying the second 
part, which is the only down fall.
I really enjoyed the puzzles. The interface is not as smoothly immersive as The Room series, but still an excellent game overall. Would recommend.
I play a lot of escape games. This is by far the best escape game.

I want a refund Glitch!!  I purchased two games by Glitch, both of which stopped working.   I had the same problem with this game as did many others in that I get a black screen after the elevator sequence.   I notified Glitch but they've been unresponsive.
A must play! Incredibly worth it. Probably the best escape game out there so far.
Was looking for "the room" type game.  This surpassed it.  Awesome.  I've already purchased episode 2 and the prequel without even seeing them.  Fantastic job.

I didn't have any issues with glitches or game play, in fact I found it to to be pretty intuitive and mostly easy to follow. What I had a huge issue with was the story's ending. To spend $15 on the three episodes and then be let down this much by an ending is really frustrating. But if you're playing for the puzzles alone it would probably be very enjoyable.

After playing 2 and 3 I was disappointed with how short this was for the price. With that in mind I still recommend you play it if you can afford to spend the cash. If money is tight you might want to choose 2 or 3 and skip this one.
By the time all the additional files had downloaded, the time for a refund had passed and the app doesn't go past a black screen on my device.
replyContent:
Hi Joyce, 

Sorry to hear this! What device are you playing on? It might be that you need the SD version rather than the HD version.

Please email graham@glitchgames.co.uk and we can sort a refund for you.

Thanks,

Graham

content: I was enjoying it until I had the same issue as others...  After exiting the elevator in chapter 3, I enter the hallway and the screen goes black and there's no way to progress any further. I suppose I could try reinstall but that would be a lot of work with no guarantee that it wouldn't just happen again.  Happy to change my rating if a fix is released.
Awesome
Its a good game with mostly fun puzzles. But for that price its waaay to short and simplistic.
It should either be cheaper or longer.  Otherwise a good game.

A straightforward room escape game with simple puzzles, unfortunately there are glitches that make things difficult to read or click on. Controls are clunky and slow to respond to input. Hint system is terrible (you exit to the main menu, select hints, you get a list of hint numbers and the button to show a hint rarely responds, so you end up pressing randomly over and over on the one spot)

At the beginning of chapter 3 I lost all of my controls (home, inventory, etc). I restarted the game, and when I walk down the corridor after exiting the elevator, the screen turns black. I am unable to continue from this point. I read through the comments and saw that I am not the only person that had this problem. A decent game otherwise. Please fix your bugs.
Reasonable puzzles but it is too short for the price. Finished in a few hours without need of hints or walk through.

Interesting this comes from glitch games, because it is unplayable. Keeps jumping from a new scene to a past area over and over, impossible to move or go forward. Also beyond creepy, more like horror atmosphere...seems unnecessary, or at least advertise that.  Wish I hadn't paid for it. Uninstalled
The Room 1, 2 and 3 are far better. Don't waste the money on this boring episode.
A very good puzzle game it only gets 4 stars as it cost £3.20 and it only lasted me 1hr n half !
Started of well was progressing but went to play it and I was right back at the beginning :( not impressed after paying for this game
Great Game =)                                                                                  Loved It !!!
In the class of Myst....
Great game. All the puzzles were logical and the toughest thing was trying to remember where I had seen the clues before. Looking forward to playing the next episode

I'm a lil upset i spent $3.11 for this game and i know i won't be able to get my money back.lol wasn't bad just to dark and dreary for me.I like games with beautiful scenery.This was to depressing. Didnt even want to finish uninstalled.
Awesome game!! Just finished forever lost 3 and loved it too!! I wish they were making more!
Best!
This game is not for the "hidden object" lover, it's for true mystery and puzzle-adventure lovers! I love all three episodes and they just keep getting better and better!

This is part one of the Forever lost Trilogy. Very intriguing story, great graphics and music. The puzzles can be challenging and if you ever get stuck, there is a whole book of hints in the title screen. Recommended!
My favorite game series to date.
I think the beginning could have been better but it gets more interesting pretty fast!
This isn't really about solving puzzles so much as just trying to remember where everything goes. Good memory training.
Great game for people who love old school adventure games without stupid hidden object puzzles.
Great game! Not too difficult but not too easy either
My favorite
Galaxy S5, latest Lollipop. Chapter 3 continues to lose all contols and cannot be bypassed. I was really enjoying the game too.
Started ok but the conversation between the game pieces in the forest keeps popping up in other rooms. Incredibly annoying since I had to pay for the game.
Intuitive,  engaging with much to remember......use  the camera regularly : )
Brilliant..
after getting used to the style, I played it in one go! really enjoyed the riddles and the atmosphere! there's hints that ensure a good flow of the game, if you're stuck..
Excellent game.
Excellent escape game, nice puzzles!
Great game, super graphics, challenging puzzles for smarties, interesting soundtrack. Genuinely one of the best escape games since the days of Myst.
Great puzzle rpg
I didn't like it, but you might.

If you like The Room or even Half Life (console game) you will love this. Not too hard, but hard enough and very enthralling with plenty of hints that are not spoilers. Absolutely love the detail of the puzzles. Use the camera as your notebook, you're going to need it. Can't wait to try 2 & 3 as well as their up coming games. Well done guys!!!!
One of the best adventure storyline and puzzle solving android games I've played
I loved it! Now on to Episode 2...
Made it up the elevator and it's nothing but a Dark Black Screen with music...
Its so fun to play me and my friend love to play it we played the first one and finished it so now we want to get the second one so we did
Addictive puzzle game

The game ran fine for a few hours. Now it only gives the new game option and lost my progress. Worst part is the only option is to reset it but it keeps happening. Designer is not responding to my request for assistance via private message. Don't download it.

Was looking for something as good as 'the room' and 'the room 2' and came across a lot of disappointments when it comes to escape games... All too easy with weak graphics.... But I am pleased that I found this series and will definitely be playing more episodes/levels. I can't say it's as great as 'the room', but it's definitely a solid alternative in comparison to it's peers.

On samsung note3 the game frequently forgets the previous progress and offers only "new game" instead of "continue". Happened to me now three times and always short before the end. Game is good but this flaw makes it garbage.
If u love the room u will love this.  The game is nice and long, hints design is great, looks awesome and has a good story. Highly recommended.

I'm a big fan of the myst series and fell in love with "the Room". This was advertised as " The Room with more rooms". False advertising. Poor controls, uninteresting puzzles, flat appearance. I won't bother to finish it. It may only be the price of a coffee... but I'd take the coffee, thanks.
Great game. Could not get it to save and lost my progress. :(

Such puzzles / adventures are all I do for years... and I have seen them all. These 2 guys at Glitch Games UK are undoubtedly THE best !!! (No I am not affiliated with them..). I couldn't believe the  immersion with long game play, logic, graphics, puzzle solving... sorry, but you do have to 'think' outside the square!!  Look for total twists in logic and take some words literally! ! Hint...  Insanely logical & logically insane at the same time. Take many photos and go back over old ground... again... Wow..
Some good cryptic challenges, really enjoy the theme.

A fun puzzle game with good graphics and storyline.  I enjoy these types of games much more on a tablet rather than a PC.  My only complaint  is all the walking around, back and forth, etc.. that one has to do.   It's tedious and makes it harder to enjoy the game.  I found I had to resort to the hints more than I would like because it was hard to keep track of which items goes where.  I did find one problem.  I couldn't see the zodiak sign on the patient notes with the glasses on.  I had to resort to finding a screen capture in a walkthrough to get it.

Loved the graphics and premise of this game. The story is so  interesting, I'd love more insight on the experiments and locations! Hopefilly that's coming in future chapters. :-) very intuitive game, easy to jump in and get addicted.
Opened the game recently to find my saved game is gone. Not worth finishing now.
Amazing game

I enjoyed the format, but for a game ultimately as simple as this (point and click, no animations) I expect less significant bugs, especially after paying 3 dollars. I have the same bug several others did with the hallway after the elevator. As far as I know I've beaten the game but don't get to see the real ending!!! Very frustrating after 4 hrs and $3!!
Really hard. Really freaky man. Great graphics. Bought number 2 without hesitation. Thanks guys worth every penny.
Terrible
Second chapter is twice as long for the same price, but this is still a fun, thoughtful game. Wish I had only paid .99 cents but oh well.

At last, a game to rival the Myst and Riven games of old.  Beautiful graphics and puzzles galore, with an underlying story to intrigue you. Great for the brain and as good as immersing yourself in an addictive thriller. Not quite finished it yet but already downloaded episode 2 and can't wait for episode 3!
Compared to a great many other games of this type it was awful. I only finished because I paid for it.
Great puzzles
Couldn't be better. Take a notebook. There's a lot to remember, even with the camera.  Now for episode two.
How do I get pass the firstt room after I pick up the key n screwdrives? I know the hints dont work so was wonderi g if I canget a lil help thank u
Detailed and engrosing
This and episode 2 are amazing and fun! Can't wait for episode 3
Was enjoying playing this until all my items disappeared. Have to reset and start again :-(
until the in game back button decided to stop working. I reset the game and started over but it still didn't work, making play impossible.
Great adventure puzzle game. Love these games! -- Bought and played this one yesterday. Downloading FL 2 now....
ConstaNtly freezes on me. ... want my money back! !!!!!!!!

No way this thing was worth the money...graphics are average at best, about half of the pieces you find and puzzles you solve have nothing to do with the end solution, and I finished the whole thing in an hour....I'm embarrassed that I bought it...
This is a great agem.  Can't wait for Forever Lost 3.
Should be longer for the price.

I was loooooving the game. Then I opened it and all my data was lost and I had to restart. Ok, not great but fun to redo and probably I would remember most of what I had done but then the kicker...NEVER OPENS (just music and a black screen). Sigh. Depression sets in, but wait...switch to my iPad and play the new ROOM 2 and heaven returns.
Could not stop and I'm on to ep2!!!
The game seems nice but the only way to stop playing is to restart my device. Is there a button I can't see? Galaxy S4

I was thoroughly enjoying this game until I got to chapter 3 when all of a sudden I lost all controls (home button,camera,inventory etc). So I restarted the game and after the elevator I go down the corridor to find a black screen and can go no further. This has happened every time I have tried to go back to the game. A bug fix would be useful.
I really love games that get me thinking and this one does just that. It's full of mystery and impossible to put down.
Cannot wait to play forever Lost 2
Great point and click adventure game. Beautiful graphics, clever puzzles and excellent controls.

Beautiful graphics, very atmospheric, with nice tricky yet clever puzzles to solve. I liked the in-game hints and had to use them a few times, but they didn't give you the answer straight out so you still have to think for yourself - like having a built-in paper and pen to jot down notes. The in-game camera was also very helpful. Loved the twist at the end and have now downloaded episode 2. Fantastic escape game that will really grip you and get the grey matter working!
Very atmospheric!

I've a s Samsung galaxy S4 and I have this issue exiting the game...I just for the life of me exit in a normal way as I'm used to instead I more or less have to(well honestly I'm forced to!) Reboot touchwitch all over and over. But my guess is that there's more than just a few bugs in the new android 4.3?
Awesome

The game is great, but a couple of days ago i opened it to find out that all my game progress has gone. I had no continue button, instead there was start game button. When i pressed it, and introduction started and everything was as at the beginning, doors locked, materac not torn but... i still had with me the items from the later stages of the game. I have no camera, but when i solved the jig saw with the camera again and the box opened there was no camera. Very strange. I want my game back!!! Has anybody else had the same problem? Would give 5 stars if everything was ok. Ps. back button still not working.

Still images linked together with an loosly linear and predictable story. Beat it without hints in one or two sittings for reasonably intelligent adult. Most puzzles solved by remembering where you saw  a symbol. There are plenty of bugs on a Galaxy S3 that should have deserved a sub 4 star rating. All item icons and the onscreen back up button dissapeared making it impossible to win without quiting and returning multiple times.

Highly recommended for anyone who enjoyed mid-1990s point-and-click adventure classics like Myst and Amber. A bit short in duration (took me 3 evenings to finish), and a couple of obtuse puzzles that required brute-forcing of combinations, but honestly I'm just nitpicking. Bottom line: top notch production, and a good bit of brain-twisting fun while it lasted.
Excellent logical puzzles, great graphics and atmosphere
Screen goes black when forward after out of elevator.

I absolutely loved this game. Entertaining and addicting! The hints came in handy at certain points and I like that they are built into the game. I will definitely be buying the next episode and hopefully many more after that =]

I've played many escape games and this is the best I've played yet. A good length for a small price. Fair but quite hard in places. And, like Myst, the puzzles dont feel meaningless and random but are tied nicely together by the background story. Look forward to playing part 2.
Nice graphics and atmosphere. Logical puzzles that draw you in. A must for thoughtful gamers.  Hoping for another episode. Played great on droid tablet
Did not enjoy... did not finish.  Uninstalled.
Best quest I've played on my tablet. If i could put 10 stars out of five, i've put :)
Game will not open

Interface is not very responsive. Tapping does not always execute. Hints page is terrible. Hints do not open and scrolling is completely useless. Could be a much better game if the interface was half decent.

The games is good in graphics, gameplay and music for this type of game. I had 2 bugs one time i went to continue and took me back to the start but with all my items i had collected, there was no key to pick up on the first screen so had to do a total reset. I finally managed to get behind the bookcase but the screen just goes black when i try to move on after the lift. Is this a bug you can fix? otherwise i would like a refund as i cannot complete the game. Gutted!!! it's a good game otherwise.
Best escape game I've played so far can't wait to start episode 2
Puzzles were moderate in difficulty.  Gameplay was enjoyable. I finished with about 1.25 hours gametime.
Great game only used the hints once ish good control system looking forward 2 episode 2 :-)
Great game, had me hooked for hours. Definitely worth the money.

Really good puzzle game. Don't know about the hints because i didn't try to use them, but the game itself worked great. Had a good story line, great puzzles, and the atmosphere was outstanding. Can't wait for the next one
Wasted $2.99

This game has borders on each side of my screen and also I can't exit, the back button won't take me out, I can't see an exit button so I press Home and have to kill the app with the task manager (all u will hear is the in-game music=battery drain if I dont kill it). Until these problems are fixed I can't play it. I will up my review if the app gets fixed. My recommendation to HTC one users is to get 'The Room' a polished game which seems similar to this.
I liked it but there are less expensive games of the same or higher quality.  I think the comparison to "The Room" is a stretch but all in all, it's a good game.
Tried playing for the first time but the screen goes black then boots back to desktop. Does it not work on rooted phones? How does one apply for a refund?

I suppose this worked well in the ios...it did not translate completely to android.  The puzzles were well thought out and well clued, but the game is Glitchy.  The hints didn't work at all when I got the game,  but an update said it would fix that.... It did sort of, sometimes they work now, most times they don't.   Not sure I've reached the end of the game... The screen goes blank and I have to goto home in Android to get out of the app.... so if you're looking for some kind of reward at the end of the game, it ain't there.   There were also buttons that looked like return keys sprinkled throughout the game.  They didn't do anything so not sure what they were.  All in all...klunky but playable with patience.
This is an excellent game - a classic point-and-tap (rather than point and click!) with some fiendish puzzles and an intriguing storyline. Sad that it's over - want more please!

Thanks Glitch for cheaper price and replying so quickly (8 minutes) to tell me the news. I've been checking every other day for this version to hit the play store. This game is very memorable and satisfies completely when I finished it. Great creepy environment and solid gameplay with clever puzzles and clues. I have nearly a dozen point and click games on my phone and this one is in top favorites. The ingame camera is the best idea and has help guide if stuck. Will definitely buy more of this series.
